title: Ashes archive: England avoid whitewash as Anderson saves Test
text:
James Anderson survives the last over of the fourth Test in Melbourne to give England a draw and avoid an Ashes whitewash in the 2021-22 series.

WATCH MORE: Burns bowled first ball of Ashes

Listen to ball-by-ball commentary from the Ashes on BBC Sounds and watch the best of the action on the BBC Sport app and BBC iPlayer.

Available to UK users only.
summary: James Anderson survives the last over of the fourth Test in Melbourne to give England a draw and avoid an Ashes whitewash in the 2021-22 series.
